Prev: Pregame Cheer Up: Riptide vs. Killer Frogs Next: Third Base Coach, II

Third Base Coach, I



The Killer Frogs started the game with players as both first and third base coaches Ñ the team coach told us that doing this has really helped with the kids' understanding of the game. Eventually, the ump said that according to the rules one of the two positions had to be an adult, so they left a kid at first and sent an adult to third.
Taken Saturday, May 06, 2006, 11:47:09AM. Original image size: 2048x2560, 802kb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1600s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 160mm (256mm equiv)
